item.title: Witness Tampering: Threats Received from French Elected Official Cédric Villani
item.description: Witness Tampering by Cédric Villani via his campaign’s director of communication Philippe Mouricou To describe Cédric Villani’s former position at the French Assemblée Nationale in terms Americans might easily understand, you could explain that he served in a role similar to that of a U.S. Congressman. Specifically, Villani was a Member of Parliament (MP) in France, representing a legislative district and participating in the creation and passage of national laws. In France, the Assemblée Nationale is the lower house of the French Parliament, akin to the U.
